title: Ugly Christians: And the Beautiful Solution
description: The author discusses the impact Christians are having on society when they choose to be "ugly." Do you wrestle with the way you have been treated by the church in the past? Are you a Christian that has found it difficult to be around other believers? Or, maybe you find yourself struggling to love people that believe or think differently than you. If any of these hold true, Ugly Christians was written for you. Ugly Christians is intended to create a conversation among people of all walks. Believers and non-believers, the oppressed and the privileged, the marginalized and the mainstreamers. Sharing a story of the pain that ugliness toward others can cause, as well as ultimate redemption and radical love
author: Nicole Littletaylor
